name: The Grand Verge
description:
No one has ever seen or been to The Grand Verge. Reportedly this place is at ground zero, an island where life ends according to the writings of an anthropologist.

But it turned out that everyone was wrong. The Grand Verge is a book from a time before the first apocalypse. Written by the one who came from the past, The Grandmaster, THE SK00L.

The book contains the truth and existence of the legacy of SK00L which has been hidden by the authorities.
